channel.title: Ancient Magics On The Blank Tab. EDITED!
channel.description:
How do I remove the Ancient Magics on the blank tab next to the friends list? e.i. I click on the tab left of the friends list happy face and it shows the ancients, how do I remove that so I can add in the ancient altar and stuff so people have to pray there to get ancient magic?
[b]EDIT:[/b]I know I search sidebarinterface and I have but there's only npcDialogue that changes my regular magic to ancients and that's the dark mage and talking to him only brings up a shop, so it doesn't work, then I found one that does it for the ancient altar. It works, but I don't want the Ancient Spells on that empty tab left of the friends list tab.

item.title: Ancient Magics On The Blank Tab. EDITED!
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Jbar. I did search that. I only found 2 things which I already posted. I don’t know how to get rid of it. Someone just tell me how to delete it already god.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Thanks But I just want it to where I can get the Ancients tab off. It’s left of the Friends List Smiley Face Tab. How would I delete it? I don’t want it there because my altar already works. I just need the stupid Ancients Tab to go away.

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient Magics On The Blank Tab. EDITED!

item.title: Ancient Magics On The Blank Tab. EDITED!
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

ok heres the code for the ancients alter to work

if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 0) { setAnimation(812); emotes = 2; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic."); } else if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 1) { setAnimation(812); emotes = 0; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic."); }
you should already have it though if its czar

heres a switch command also

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch") && (ancients == 0)) { { setAnimation(812); emotes = 2; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic."); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch") && (ancients == 1)) { { setAnimation(812); emotes = 0; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic."); }

i made that btw it wasnt leeched lol

Read full topic
